title: Game is like dodgeball now.
body:
The 800 skillshots that missed you are entirely irrelevant, but that one stray ludens proc you missed? Yeah it one hit you

Yes Iâ€™m exagerating. But not by much. :/

replies.body: If you can dodge a wrench, you can dodge a ball. -{{champion:74}}
